title: Ezreal's Mystic Shot Procs Kleptomancy
body: Oh god this is dumb...I feel like for the class that depends the most on achieving a heavy gold lead, giving up some extra damage in the late game to hit your item spikes faster is just kind of worth it...

replies.body: And now you know why I ban Ez ;)
So Zoe won't steal him away from you?
I don't want ez. Zoe can try to steal him, but it won't be from me. {{champion:44}}

Yes, but GP is already kind of balanced around the idea that he can ramp up gold with his Q. Plus he's not ranged, not really. He has the potential to hyper carry if he's given long enough, but it's not the same as someone who has an AS buff and can build IE.
Well looks like its time to dusk my Ezreal off, besides late game everyone hits hard now. Its who can win under 20 that wins the game now.
Ez q is intended to proc such things
Oh I know, that's why this isn't a PSA or anything. But still, we've never had an on-hit effect that granted gold before.
